attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt and respect the advice of scientists with regard to drug policy and other areas of  scientific advice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the disgraceful sacking of Professor David Nutt from his position as a senior drugs advisor and Chair of the Advisory Committee on the Misuse of Drugs, this petition calls on the Prime Minister to reinstate him to this possition.

Further to this, this petition calls on the Prime Minister and Government to hold to their pledges to base policy on scientific policy and not on ideology or fear of reaction from the tabloid press.
